title: Ticket #6569: Test multiple PEAK metrics.
description:
To be completed after #6544.

All of these tests should be performed against multiple instances of the same resource, but no more than one per slot:

  • A monitor which reports multiple PEAK metrics.
  • A monitor which reports both SQUIDsUsage and SQUIDsMemoryUsage. (Testing one SUM metric and one PEAK metric).
  • A monitor which reports multiple PEAK and multiple SUM metrics. (To be completed after #6543.)
remarks:
2018-Feb-19 15:03:45 by tlmiller:
These tests should also be performed against both dynamic and static slot configurations, and in the face of slot reuse.

2018-Mar-14 16:49:05 by tlmiller:
See #6605, instead.
check_ins: 2018-Feb-22 13:51   Check-in [54344]: (#6544) Test one PEAK metric. (#6569) Test one SUM and one PEAK metric simultaneously. Patch up some other testing bugs. Activate both one-PEAK and one-PEAK-and-one-SUM tests. (By Todd L Miller )
creator: tlmiller
